room_title: Escape room "Dead Man’s Cove" by 15 Locks in Austin
review: Dead Man's Cove is perhaps the best room in the greater Austin area (or is at least my favorite). The amount of thought and work that went into not only the mechanics and technology of the room but the story really shows. And that's not even bringing in how you receive hints - which is awesome. I fully expect to be back in a few months to play the room again with different people.

room_title: Escape room "Dead Man’s Cove" by 15 Locks in Austin
review: Did the new pirate room and it was so much fun! I had an absolute blast. I will be returning!

room_title: Escape room "Dead Man’s Cove" by 15 Locks in Austin
review: Just fantastic - We had a ton of fun and managed to get 4th place in escape time. The puzzles were challenging and amazing.

room_title: Escape room "Dead Man’s Cove" by 15 Locks in Austin
review: We did frequency and it was so much fun! The owner and designer of the rooms is very creative. We are definitely headed back to try the other rooms. Two thumbs up!

room_title: Escape room "Dead Man’s Cove" by 15 Locks in Austin
review: It was an incredible experience and I highly recommend going. solve the clues and puzzles as you race against the clock to escape your room in under an hour. It's a great idea for businesses and employee team building or just a way to hang with a few friends. "Frequency" was fully submersible and quite s challenge. Can't wait to book my next room.
